code: import React from'react';import'./FilterStyles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GenreFilter=_ref=>{let{selectedGenres,onGenreChange,onClearFilters}=_ref;const genres=['Rock','Jazz','Hip-Hop','Electronic','Classical','Pop','Soul','Country'];const handleGenreChange=genre=>{const updatedGenres=selectedGenres.includes(genre)?selectedGenres.filter(g=>g!==genre):[...selectedGenres,genre];onGenreChange(updatedGenres);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Genre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClearFilters,className:"clear-filter-btn","aria-label":"Clear genre filters",children:"Clear"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-options",children:genres.map(genre=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"filter-option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:selectedGenres.includes(genre),onChange:()=>handleGenreChange(genre)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"checkbox-custom"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"option-label",children:genre})]},genre))})]});};export default GenreFilter;
